verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> shall be unto you the beginning <S%H7218><s%> of months: <S%H2320><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> shall be the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%> to you.

Speak <S%H1696><s%> ye unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> In the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of this <S%H2088><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> they shall take <S%H3947><s%> to them every man <S%H376><s%> a lamb, <S%H7716><s%> according to the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> a lamb <S%H7716><s%> for a house: <S%H1004><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> the household <S%H1004><s%> be too little <S%H4591><s%> for the lamb, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1961><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7716><s%> let him <S%H1931><s%> and his neighbor <S%H7934><s%> next <S%H7138><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his house <S%H1004><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> it according to the number <S%H4373><s%> of the souls; <S%H5315><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> according to <S%H6310><s%> his eating <S%H400><s%> shall make your count <S%H3699><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> the lamb. <S%H7716><s%>

Your lamb <S%H7716><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> without blemish, <S%H8549><s%> a male <S%H2145><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year: <S%H8141><s%> ye shall take it out <S%H3947><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the sheep, <S%H3532><s%> or from <S%H4480><s%> the goats: <S%H5795><s%>

And ye shall keep <S%H1961><s%> <S%H4931><s%> it up until <S%H5704><s%> the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the same <S%H2088><s%> month: <S%H2320><s%> and the whole <S%H3605><s%> assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall kill <S%H7819><s%> it in <S%H996><s%> the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

And they shall take <S%H3947><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the blood, <S%H1818><s%> and strike <S%H5414><s%> it on <S%H5921><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> side posts <S%H4201><s%> and on <S%H5921><s%> the upper door post <S%H4947><s%> of <S%H5921><s%> the houses, <S%H1004><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> they shall eat <S%H398><s%> it.

And they shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H853><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> in that <S%H2088><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> roast <S%H6748><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> and unleavened bread; <S%H4682><s%> and with <S%H5921><s%> bitter <S%H4844><s%> herbs they shall eat <S%H398><s%> it.

Eat <S%H398><s%> not <S%H408><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> it raw, <S%H4995><s%> nor sodden at all <S%H1311><s%> <S%H1310><s%> with water, <S%H4325><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> roast <S%H6748><s%> with fire; <S%H784><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> his legs, <S%H3767><s%> and with <S%H5921><s%> the purtenance <S%H7130><s%> thereof.

And ye shall let nothing <S%H3808><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> it remain <S%H3498><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the morning; <S%H1242><s%> and that which remaineth <S%H3498><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> it until <S%H5704><s%> the morning <S%H1242><s%> ye shall burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

And thus <S%H3602><s%> shall ye eat <S%H398><s%> it; with your loins <S%H4975><s%> girded, <S%H2296><s%> your shoes <S%H5275><s%> on your feet, <S%H7272><s%> and your staff <S%H4731><s%> in your hand; <S%H3027><s%> and ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> it in haste: <S%H2649><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> passover. <S%H6453><s%>

For I will pass through <S%H5674><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> night, <S%H3915><s%> and will smite <S%H5221><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> both man <S%H4480><s%> <S%H120><s%> and beast; <S%H929><s%> and against all <S%H3605><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> I will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgment: <S%H8201><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> to you for a token <S%H226><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> where <S%H834><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> are: and when I see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blood, <S%H1818><s%> I will pass <S%H6452><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you, and the plague <S%H5063><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> upon you to destroy <S%H4889><s%> you, when I smite <S%H5221><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> unto you for a memorial; <S%H2146><s%> and ye shall keep <S%H2287><s%> it a feast <S%H2282><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> throughout your generations; <S%H1755><s%> ye shall keep it a feast <S%H2287><s%> by an ordinance <S%H2708><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall ye eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread; <S%H4682><s%> even <S%H389><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> ye shall put away <S%H7673><s%> leaven <S%H7603><s%> out of your houses: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> whosoever <S%H3605><s%> eateth <S%H398><s%> leavened bread <S%H2557><s%> from the first day <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7223><s%> <S%H3117><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from Israel. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3478><s%>

And in the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation, <S%H4744><s%> and in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> there shall be <S%H1961><s%> a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%> to you; no <S%H3808><s%> manner <S%H3605><s%> of work <S%H4399><s%> shall be done <S%H6213><s%> in them, save <S%H389><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H5315><s%> must eat, <S%H398><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> only <S%H905><s%> may be done <S%H6213><s%> of you.

And ye shall observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the feast of unleavened bread; <S%H4682><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> selfsame <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> have I brought your armies out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6635><s%> of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> therefore shall ye observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> in your generations <S%H1755><s%> by an ordinance <S%H2708><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>

In the first <S%H7223><s%> month, on the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%> at even, <S%H6153><s%> ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread, <S%H4682><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%> at even. <S%H6153><s%>

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall there be no <S%H3808><s%> leaven <S%H7603><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> in your houses: <S%H1004><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> whosoever <S%H3605><s%> eateth <S%H398><s%> that which is leavened, <S%H2557><s%> even that <S%H1931><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from the congregation <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5712><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whether he be a stranger, <S%H1616><s%> or born <S%H249><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>
Ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> nothing <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> leavened; <S%H2557><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> your habitations <S%H4186><s%> shall ye eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened bread. <S%H4682><s%>

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Draw out <S%H4900><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> you a lamb <S%H6629><s%> according to your families, <S%H4940><s%> and kill <S%H7819><s%> the passover. <S%H6453><s%>

And ye shall take <S%H3947><s%> a bunch <S%H92><s%> of hyssop, <S%H231><s%> and dip <S%H2881><s%> it in the blood <S%H1818><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in the basin, <S%H5592><s%> and strike <S%H5060><s%> <S%H413><s%> the lintel <S%H4947><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> side posts <S%H4201><s%> with <S%H4480><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in the basin; <S%H5592><s%> and none <S%H3808><s%> <S%H376><s%> of you <S%H859><s%> shall go out <S%H3318><s%> at the door <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6607><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will pass through <S%H5674><s%> to smite <S%H5062><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Egyptians; <S%H4714><s%> and when he seeth <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the lintel, <S%H4947><s%> and on <S%H5921><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> side posts, <S%H4201><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will pass <S%H6452><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the door, <S%H6607><s%> and will not <S%H3808><s%> suffer <S%H5414><s%> the destroyer <S%H7843><s%> to come in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> your houses <S%H1004><s%> to smite <S%H5062><s%> you.
And ye shall observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> for an ordinance <S%H2706><s%> to thee and to thy sons <S%H1121><s%> forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> ye be come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> you, according as <S%H834><s%> he hath promised, <S%H1696><s%> that ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> service. <S%H5656><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you, What <S%H4100><s%> mean ye by this <S%H2063><s%> service? <S%H5656><s%>

That ye shall say, <S%H559><s%> It <S%H1931><s%> is the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> passover, <S%H6453><s%> who <S%H834><s%> passed <S%H6452><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> when he smote <S%H5062><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and delivered <S%H5337><s%> our houses. <S%H1004><s%> And the people <S%H5971><s%> bowed the head <S%H6915><s%> and worshiped. <S%H7812><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went away, <S%H1980><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> they.

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that at midnight <S%H2677><s%> <S%H3915><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from the firstborn <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1060><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> that sat <S%H3427><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of the captive <S%H7628><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was in the dungeon; <S%H1004><s%> <S%H953><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of cattle. <S%H929><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> in the night, <S%H3915><s%> he, <S%H1931><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the Egyptians; <S%H4714><s%> and there was <S%H1961><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> cry <S%H6818><s%> in Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> there was not <S%H369><s%> a house <S%H1004><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> there was not <S%H369><s%> one dead. <S%H4191><s%>

And he called <S%H7121><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Rise up, <S%H6965><s%> and get you forth <S%H3318><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and go, <S%H1980><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> as ye have said. <S%H1696><s%>

Also <S%H1571><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> your flocks <S%H6629><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> your herds, <S%H1241><s%> as <S%H834><s%> ye have said, <S%H1696><s%> and be gone; <S%H1980><s%> and bless <S%H1288><s%> me also. <S%H1571><s%>

And the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> were urgent <S%H2388><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> that they might send them out <S%H7971><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> in haste; <S%H4116><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they said, <S%H559><s%> We be all <S%H3605><s%> dead <S%H4191><s%> men.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> took <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> their dough <S%H1217><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> it was leavened, <S%H2556><s%> their kneading troughs <S%H4863><s%> being bound up <S%H6887><s%> in their clothes <S%H8071><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> their shoulders. <S%H7926><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Moses; <S%H4872><s%> and they borrowed <S%H7592><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and raiment: <S%H8071><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> <S%H853><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> so that they lent <S%H7592><s%> unto them such things as they required. And they spoiled <S%H5337><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Rameses <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7486><s%> to Succoth, <S%H5523><s%> about six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> on foot <S%H7273><s%> that were men, <S%H1397><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> children. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2945><s%>

And a mixed <S%H6154><s%> multitude <S%H7227><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them; and flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and herds, <S%H1241><s%> even very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H3515><s%> cattle. <S%H4735><s%>

And they baked <S%H644><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H5692><s%> of <S%H853><s%> the dough <S%H1217><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they brought forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it was not leavened; <S%H3808><s%> <S%H2556><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they were thrust out <S%H1644><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> and could <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> tarry, <S%H4102><s%> neither <S%H1571><s%> <S%H3808><s%> had they prepared <S%H6213><s%> for themselves any victual. <S%H6720><s%>

Now the sojourning <S%H4186><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H834><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> was four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> at the end <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7093><s%> of the four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> even the selfsame <S%H2088><s%> <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> the hosts <S%H6635><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> from the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

It <S%H1931><s%> is a night <S%H3915><s%> to be much observed <S%H8107><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for bringing them out <S%H3318><s%> from the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> is that <S%H1931><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to be observed <S%H8107><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in their generations. <S%H1755><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is the ordinance <S%H2708><s%> of the passover: <S%H6453><s%> There shall no <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> stranger <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5236><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> thereof:

But every <S%H3605><s%> man's <S%H376><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> that is bought <S%H4736><s%> for money, <S%H3701><s%> when thou hast circumcised <S%H4135><s%> him, then <S%H227><s%> shall he eat <S%H398><s%> thereof.
